title: Strengthening Teaching Practical Competencies: Construction Entrepreneurship Simulation Experiential Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically calculate budget and resource allocation problems encountered in construction sites.
Learners gain hands-on experience with the actual business model design process through construction startup simulations.
Learners create construction-related startup plans (including revenue models and risk management) through team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
